cleaned_text: at Tektronix](https://covidblog.oregon.gov/art-projects-make-covid-19-vaccinations-fun-at-tektronix/) [](https://covidblog.oregon.gov/art-projects-make-covid-19-vaccinations-fun-at-tektronix/) Available in Spanish Thursdays are special days at the COVID-19 vaccination and booster clinic at Tektronix in Beaverton. On Thursdays, a long, colorful table — covered in doodles, blobs of molding clay, markers, colored pencils and other art supplies — awaits children after they brave their COVID-19 vaccination. The Children's Healing Art
